Privacy Policy

Effective Date: May 16, 2025

ApprovedOffers ("we," "us," "our," or the "Company") recognizes the importance of privacy, confidentiality, and security of your personal data and values the trust you place in us. This Privacy Policy is designed to maximize our ability to provide valuable services while maintaining appropriate protections for your information.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information

  • Identity Information: Name, email address, phone number, date of birth, gender, marital status, and parental details
  • Financial Information: Income, loan amount, loan purpose, credit score, credit history, bank account details, payment information
  • Government Identifiers: Social Security Number, Tax Identification Number, Driver's License Number, Passport Number (where permitted by law)
  • Employment Information: Employer details, employment status, industry type, job title, work history, monthly income
